feedItems.subject: Meeting Tomorrow
feedItems.preview: Hi, just wanted to confirm our meeting tomorrow at 2 PM. Please let me know if you need to reschedule.

feedItems.description: Beautiful sunset from my hike today! The colors were absolutely amazing and the view was worth every step.
Just finished reading an amazing book about productivity. Highly recommend it to anyone looking to improve their workflow.

feedItems.subject: Project Update
feedItems.preview: The project is progressing well. We should have the first draft ready by next week.

feedItems.description: Amazing coffee shop discovery today! The atmosphere is perfect for getting work done.

feedItems.subject: Weekend Plans
feedItems.preview: Hey everyone, just wanted to check if anyone is interested in hiking this weekend?

feedItems.description: Just finished an incredible photography workshop. Can't wait to apply these new techniques!

feedItems.subject: Team Lunch
feedItems.preview: Let's organize a team lunch for next week. Please let me know your availability.
